strapiPost.title: Mayor Hines Gives 2023 State Of The City Address For Rogers
strapiPost.content:
Mayor Hines delivered the 2023 State of the City presentation this week, calling attention to the city of Rogers's significant progress in economic development, public safety, and quality of life.

  • Looking good: The economy of Rogers is thriving, with sales tax collections reaching an all-time high of over $26m in 2022 and the addition of 1,300 new jobs. A couple of upcoming multifamily developments are expected to increase housing by 150%.
  • The hot spot: Rogers is becoming a hub for regional events, like the LPGA Walmart Northwest Arkansas Championship, Bikes, Blues, and BBQ, and frequent sold-out shows at the Walmart AMP.

Watch Mayor Hines' full address HERE.
